data.title: Apply Now — Awesome Portland
data.meta_description: We'll fund your idea to make Portland more awesome! Tell us about it!
data.text:
Help keep Portland awesome! Apply for a grant today!

Applications go through the main Awesome Foundation site. Please be clear and specific about what you’ll use the money for and why it will make Portland more awesome. You can even include images to demonstrate the project. Apply now and be sure to select that this is for the Portland chapter!

What we fund

Projects in the Portland, Oregon area. We will consider ideas from other areas in Oregon as well but keep in mind that this is the Awesome Foundation Portland Chapter. We are looking for projects that will make Portland Awesomer!

We will consider all causes including art, culture, community, environment, animal welfare, human rights, diversity & inclusion, and community events.

Projects with a clear demonstration on how it will impact the Portland community.

What we don’t fund

Individuals and personal individual projects – this means funds for rent and bills, travel, or business start-up funds.'

Individual education/trainings

General operating funds for nonprofits.

Additional tips
